bio.Involvements: Indian Subcontinental Club, UBA, OIT Classroom Services Staff, Product @ UCI
bio.Bios: Hi!! My name is Aadi and I initiated in the spring of my second year with the Alpha Omicron class. In my free time I love playing basketball, football, and I biking. Along with that I love watching anime and TV shows! Ask me about how the Sacramento Kings are going to win the NBA finals this year!
